verses.verse: A Psalm of David. <S%H1732><s%> To you, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> do I lift <S%H5375><s%> up my soul. <S%H5315><s%>
O my God, <S%H430><s%> I trust <S%H982><s%> in you: let me not be ashamed, <S%H954><s%> let not my enemies <S%H341><s%> triumph <S%H5970><s%> over me.

Yes, <S%H1571><s%> let none <S%H3808><s%> that wait <S%H6960><s%> on you be ashamed: <S%H954><s%> let them be ashamed <S%H954><s%> which transgress <S%H898><s%> without <S%H7387><s%> cause. <S%H7387><s%>
Show <S%H3045><s%> me your ways, <S%H1870><s%> O LORD; <S%H3068><s%> teach <S%H3925><s%> me your paths. <S%H734><s%>

Lead <S%H1869><s%> me in your truth, <S%H571><s%> and teach <S%H3925><s%> me: for you are the God <S%H430><s%> of my salvation; <S%H3468><s%> on you do I wait <S%H6960><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the day. <S%H3117><s%>
Remember, <S%H2142><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> your tender mercies <S%H7356><s%> and your loving kindnesses; <S%H2617><s%> for they have been ever of old. <S%H5769><s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> not the sins <S%H2403><s%> of my youth, <S%H5271><s%> nor my transgressions: <S%H6588><s%> according to your mercy <S%H2617><s%> remember <S%H2142><s%> you me for your goodness' <S%H2898><s%> sake, <S%H4616><s%> O LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Good <S%H2896><s%> and upright <S%H3477><s%> is the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> will he teach <S%H3384><s%> sinners <S%H2400><s%> in the way. <S%H1870><s%>
The meek <S%H6035><s%> will he guide <S%H1869><s%> in judgment: <S%H4941><s%> and the meek <S%H6035><s%> will he teach <S%H3925><s%> his way. <S%H1870><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the paths <S%H734><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> are mercy <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> to such as keep <S%H5341><s%> his covenant <S%H1285><s%> and his testimonies. <S%H5713><s%>
For your name's <S%H8034><s%> sake, <S%H4616><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> pardon <S%H5545><s%> my iniquity; <S%H5771><s%> for it is great. <S%H7227><s%>
What <S%H4310><s%> man <S%H376><s%> is he that fears <S%H3373><s%> the LORD? <S%H3068><s%> him shall he teach <S%H3384><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> that he shall choose. <S%H977><s%>
His soul <S%H5315><s%> shall dwell <S%H3885><s%> at ease; <S%H2896><s%> and his seed <S%H2233><s%> shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>
The secret <S%H5475><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is with them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him; and he will show <S%H3045><s%> them his covenant. <S%H1285><s%>
My eyes <S%H5869><s%> are ever <S%H8548><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> for he shall pluck <S%H3318><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> out of the net. <S%H7568><s%>
Turn <S%H6437><s%> you to me, and have mercy <S%H2603><s%> on me; for I am desolate <S%H3173><s%> and afflicted. <S%H6041><s%>
The troubles <S%H6869><s%> of my heart <S%H3824><s%> are enlarged: <S%H7337><s%> O bring <S%H3318><s%> you me out of my distresses. <S%H4691><s%>
Look <S%H7200><s%> on my affliction <S%H6040><s%> and my pain; <S%H5999><s%> and forgive <S%H5375><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my sins. <S%H2403><s%>
Consider <S%H7200><s%> my enemies; <S%H341><s%> for they are many; <S%H7231><s%> and they hate <S%H8130><s%> me with cruel <S%H2555><s%> hatred. <S%H8135><s%>
O keep <S%H8104><s%> my soul, <S%H5315><s%> and deliver <S%H5337><s%> me: let me not be ashamed; <S%H954><s%> for I put my trust <S%H2620><s%> in you.
Let integrity <S%H8537><s%> and uprightness <S%H3476><s%> preserve <S%H5341><s%> me; for I wait <S%H6960><s%> on you.
Redeem <S%H6299><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> out of all <S%H3605><s%> his troubles. <S%H6869><s%>
